function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited effectiveness and safety of disinfection robots and UV systems","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in public settings","Mitigation":"Further research and development of disinfection technologies, and careful consideration of their limitations and concerns","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection robots, UV systems, and emerging technologies","People":"Public and staff in public settings","Owner":"Research institutions and technology developers"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in handling laundry and waste disposal in hotels and other public facilities during a pandemic","Impact":"Potential spread of virus through contaminated linens and waste","Mitigation":"Standardization of infection control measures for laundry and waste disposal in hotels, and development of clear guidelines for handling contaminated materials","Technologies":"Advanced laundry and waste disposal systems, IoT for monitoring and control","People":"Hotel staff, guests, and the general public","Owner":"Hotel management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of research and guidelines for proper food handling and cleaning practices in preventing foodborne infections","Impact":"Risk of future outbreaks of foodborne infections","Mitigation":"Conducting research on proper food handling and cleaning practices, and establishing clear guidelines for food safety during pandemics","Technologies":"IoT for food safety monitoring, advanced cleaning and sanitation systems","People":"Food service workers and consumers","Owner":"Public health agencies, food industry stakeholders"}]}
